metadata.synopsis: Bex and Danis just before setting off for a walk around Haven after being reunited.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to Haven -> Use debug book -> Act 2 setup -> Tiefling path Ctrl+Shift+F11 -> oe prisonersreturn(Go through the main entrance gate and down the path on your right - Bex is just through the bridge, where she is joined by Danis after oe prisonersreturn runs its course)

1.speaker: Bex
1.text: So... shall we go for a walk?

0.speaker: Danis
0.text: Anywhere, my love - I go where you go.
